title: Device Status
name: DeviceStatus
description: A class that holds the device status.

properties.name: SerialNumber
properties.description: Gets the serial number of the device

properties.name: BatteryStatus
properties.description: Gets the battery status in percentages of a device

properties.name: BatterymV
properties.description: Gets the battery milli volts of a device

properties.name: BatteryCharging
properties.description: Gets the battery charging status of a device

properties.name: ExternalPower
properties.description: Gets the status of an external power of a device

properties.name: ApplicationName
properties.description: Gets the application name used on a device

properties.name: ApplicationVersion
properties.description: Gets the application version number used on a device

title: Device Status
name: DeviceStatus
description: A class that holds the device status.

methods.title: Constructor
methods.name: DeviceStatus
methods.description:
A constructor for DeviceStatus

A DeviceStatus contains: serialNumber, batteryStatus, batterymV, batteryCharging, externalPower, applicationName and applicationVersion

parameters.name: status
parameters.notes: map containing all information about the device
